thread.title: The Pope Now Has His Own Emoji
thread.title_full: The Pope Now Has His Own Emoji

title: The Pope Now Has His Own Emoji
text:
Get Business & Technology Alerts 
23 Sep 2015 06:30 AM EST 
Today Your source for all things celebrity and entertainment. It's official, Pope Francis is the coolest Pope ever. He now has his own emoji. The honor comes courtesy of Twitter, which decided to step things up a notch in honor of Pope Francis' visit to the United States this week. The company knew that people everywhere would be tweeting up a storm about his stops in Washington, D.C., Philadelphia and New York City, so they decided to get ahead of the game and have a little fun with the sure-to-be-trending topic. You'll find that one by using #PopeInUS.
